C++ Return Value Capturing
[C++ Sensor Placement]


Defines

#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_BOOL(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(dynatrace_bool_t, return_value)
 Captures a bool return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_CHAR(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(char, return_value)
 Captures a char return value and returns it.

 Captures an int16 return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_INT32(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(dynatrace_int32_t, return_value)
 Captures an int32 return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_INT64(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(dynatrace_int64_t, return_value)
 Captures an int64 return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_FLOAT(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(float, return_value)
 Captures a float return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_DOUBLE(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(double, return_value)
 Captures a double return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_STRING(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(const char *, return_value)
 Captures a zero-terminated 7-bit ASCII (or EBCDIC on zOS) string return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_STRING_WITH_CODESET(return_value, length, ccsid)   __DYNATRACE_RETURN_2__(const char *, return_value, length, ccsid)
 Captures a string of the specified length (in bytes) and codeset (CCSID) as return value and returns it.

Detailed Description

int Foo::add(int a, int b) {
    DYNATRACE_AUTO_NODE();
    DYNATRACE_RETURN_INT32(a+b);
}

char *Foo::concat(const char *a, const char *b) {
    DYNATRACE_AUTO_NODE();
    char *cp = malloc(strlen(a) + strlen(b) + 1);
    strcpy(cp, a);
    strcat(cp, b);
    DYNATRACE_RETURN_STRING(cp);
}

#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_STRING ( return_value   )     __DYNATRACE_RETURN__(const char *, return_value)

Captures a zero-terminated 7-bit ASCII (or EBCDIC on zOS) string return value and returns it.

Remarks:
The maximum length captured depends on the dynaTrace Agent.
See also:
C++ Sensor Placement

#define DYNATRACE_RETURN_STRING_WITH_CODESET ( return_value,
length,
ccsid   )     __DYNATRACE_RETURN_2__(const char *, return_value, length, ccsid)

Captures a string of the specified length (in bytes) and codeset (CCSID) as return value and returns it.

Remarks:
The maximum length captured depends on the dynaTrace Agent.
See also:
C++ Sensor Placement
